column2: Lilith Plague
This character is suffering from the Lilith Plague and is unable to stop engaging in sexual acts. A very exhausting condition, as this character constantly tries to get off.
went out with a bang during the Lilith Plague.
The Lilith Plague, also known as the 'Fucking Disease', is spreading like wildfire amongst the populace. The ailment is possibly caused by something on the air.
The Lilith Plague

Something very strange is happening in the county of [lilith_plague_outbreak_location.GetName].

 It all started with some peasants just staring at each other in amazement. Then they dropped their clothes and started to copulate in public.

Soon there were dozens of them, and now there are hundreds - men, women and young adults alike! Groans of pleasures and joys fill the air all day and all night and the peasants barely have time to eat or sleep. The sexual orgy has gone on for days and people have started to collapse from utter exhaustion.

It seems as if the uncontrolled urge to mate is spreading at an alarming rate, with groups of copulating people setting off in the direction of other towns, but stopping every few hundred meeters for another fuck on the roadsides and in the fields.
This is truly an unprecedented situation!
After enjoying a hearty meal you look out the window at the mating peasants. Their groands and cries of joy and pleasure is tantalizingly inviting, and you have felt a bit restless as of late...
Perhaps I should join in their joyous copulations!
No, I should get some rest instead.
Join the peasant's mating!\n
Get some rest\n

Right as you are about to leave, your court physician grabs hold of your arm.

[target_physician.GetFirstName] tells you that it is not a good idea to join the orgy, lest you too should collapse from exhaustion!

Instead [target_physician.GetSheHe] recommends that you rest.
Oh well, if you say so!
No! I need to get laid!
Fucking Queen
